languages.text: "Среди мертвых не хватает одного, и теперь мне понятно, с кем бился прежде. То был брат Игнильф".
"There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."
languages.original_text: "Среди мертвых не хватает одного, и теперь мне понятно, с кем бился прежде. То был брат Игнильф".

traits.locale_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “死者之中少了个人。现在我知道之前和我战斗的那个人是谁了，那是我的兄弟伊格尼夫。”
languages.original_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."

traits.locale_text: “死者之中少了个人。现在我知道之前和我战斗的那个人是谁了，那是我的兄弟伊格尼夫。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「死者の中にひとり行方不明者がいたんだが、さっき戦ってた相手が誰かやっと分かった。ブラザー・イグニリフだ」
languages.original_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."

traits.locale_text: 「死者の中にひとり行方不明者がいたんだが、さっき戦ってた相手が誰かやっと分かった。ブラザー・イグニリフだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Hay alguien que falta entre los muertos, y ahora sé a quién me he enfrentado antes. Era el hermano Ignilf».
languages.original_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."

traits.locale_text: «Hay alguien que falta entre los muertos, y ahora sé a quién me he enfrentado antes. Era el hermano Ignilf».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il manque quelqu'un parmi les défunts. Je sais donc à présent qui j'ai combattu : il s'agissait de frère Ignilf. »
languages.original_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."

traits.locale_text: « Il manque quelqu'un parmi les défunts. Je sais donc à présent qui j'ai combattu : il s'agissait de frère Ignilf. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Einer fehlt bei den Toten, und jetzt weiß ich auch, wen ich vorhin bekämpft habe. Es war Bruder Ignilf."
languages.original_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."

traits.locale_text: "Einer fehlt bei den Toten, und jetzt weiß ich auch, wen ich vorhin bekämpft habe. Es war Bruder Ignilf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ölüler arasında bir eksik vardı. Şimdi kiminle savaştığımı biliyorum. Kardeşim İgnilf'le."
languages.original_text: "There is one missing among the dead, and now I know who I was fighting before. It was Brother Ignilf."

traits.locale_text: "Ölüler arasında bir eksik vardı. Şimdi kiminle savaştığımı biliyorum. Kardeşim Ignilf'le."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
